Dataset Name: Highly efficient and multiplexed transcriptome profiling of cardiotoxicity induced by tyrosine kinase inhibitors
Dataset Description: yrosine kinase inhibitors (TKIs) are anti-cancer therapeutics used in long-term treatment. However, many of them cause cardiotoxicity with limited cure. We aim to define molecular mechanisms of cardiotoxicity that can be targeted for oncocardiology treatment. Eight TKIs with different levels of cardiotoxicity were selected and transcriptome responses of human cardiomyocytes to them at varying dose(Read more on Pubmed)
Dataset Design: Comparative transcriptome of human cardiomyocytes treated with 8 FDA-approved TKIs. For 2 of the TKIs (Crizotinib and Ponatinib), treatments were done with 0,316µM at day 1, 3 and 5, as well as 1 and 3.16 µM at day 1. Dataset Assay: Human Induced Pluripotent Stem Cell-derived Cardiomyocytes Culture

Dataset Name: Lymphocyte networks are dynamic cellular communities in the immunoregulatory landscape of lung adenocarcinoma
Dataset Description: Lymphocytes are integral to controlling tumor progression, but our understanding of the spatial organization and physical interactions that facilitate their anti-cancer function is limited.
